statements: DELETE FROM campaign_finances WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe' AND contribution_amount > 10000.00;
DELETE FROM campaign_finances WHERE contributor_name = 'Jane Smith' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND donation_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM campaign_finances WHERE id = 100 AND campaign_name = 'Election Campaign A';
DELETE FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 AND contributor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE amount > 5000 AND date_paid < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 AND expense_date < '2022-01-01';
